code: import logo from'assests/logos/stay_booker_logo.png';import{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import HamburgerMenu from'components/hamburger-menu/HamburgerMenu';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faBars}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{AuthContext}from'contexts/AuthContext';import{useContext}from'react';import NavbarItems from'components/navbar-items/NavbarItems';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GlobalNavbar=()=>{const[isVisible,setIsVisible]=useState(false);const{isAuthenticated}=useContext(AuthContext);const onHamburgerMenuToggle=()=>{setIsVisible(!isVisible);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative flex flex-wrap justify-between items-center px-4 md:px-12 global-navbar__container bg-brand brand-divider-bottom shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"site logo",className:"site-logo__img"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-none hidden md:flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavbarItems,{isAuthenticated:isAuthenticated})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{"data-testid":"menu-toggle__button",icon:faBars,size:"2x",color:"#fff",className:"block md:hidden",onClick:onHamburgerMenuToggle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HamburgerMenu,{isVisible:isVisible,onHamburgerMenuToggle:onHamburgerMenuToggle,isAuthenticated:isAuthenticated})]});};export default GlobalNavbar;
